mutants.code:
def reverse_string(s):
    s = list(s)
    left = 1
    right = len(s) - 1
    while left < right:
        (s[left], s[right]) = (s[right], s[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    s = ''.join(s)
    print(s)
    return s

    s = ''.join(s)
